name: Bacchus Made Me Do It
description:
A 3D explorer created for Mythology Jam, with an abstract narrative based on the influence of Bacchus and the effects of alcohol.

Interact with the statues, amphoras, goblets, and parchment to discover the narrative. To interact walk close to the object.

The original images were taken from the British Library Flickr account and the "re-worked" versions were created by Andrew, A.W., Binni, Katharine, Mantu, Spoonie, Stella & myself after a few drinks.

Warning: some re-worked images contain adult themes.

Object interactation

  • Statues - act as guides
  • Amphoras - display original images
  • Goblets - display re-worked images
  • Parchment - Bacchus quotes

Keyboard controls

  • Arrow keys - move
  • Mouse - turn and look around
  • Shift - run
  • Spacebar - jump
  • Esc - Quit to main menu

Created in Game Guru.

Music track - Australiam Blue (Replay in Neon).
